project.description:
Yocto Sumo nxp3220 daily build
매주 화, 목일 s5p6818 daily build 실행 후 trigger됨.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
export LC_ALL=en_US.UTF-8 export LANG=en_US.UTF-8 export LANGUAGE=en_US.UTF-8
echo "************************************" echo " Yocto Sumo nxp3220 Source Download " echo "************************************" repo init -u ssh://nxJenkins@gerrit.coasianexell.com:29418/CoasiaNexell/nxp3220_manifest repo sync
echo "************************************" echo " nxp3220 buildroot " echo "************************************" #./tools/scripts/build_bsp.sh -f ./tools/scripts/configs/build.nxp3220-daudio.sh ./tools/scripts/build_bsp.sh -f ./tools/scripts/configs/build.nxp3220-daudio2.sh mv result result-nxp3220-daudio2-`date +%Y%m%d` tar cvzf result-nxp3220-daudio2-`date +%Y%m%d`.tar.gz result-nxp3220-daudio2-`date +%Y%m%d`/
#./tools/scripts/build_bsp.sh -f ./tools/scripts/configs/build.nxp3220-evb.sh ./tools/scripts/build_bsp.sh -f ./tools/scripts/configs/build.nxp3220-evb2.sh mv result result-nxp3220-evb2-`date +%Y%m%d` tar cvzf result-nxp3220-evb2-`date +%Y%m%d`.tar.gz result-nxp3220-evb2-`date +%Y%m%d`/
echo "************************************" echo " nxp3220 daudio-qt " echo "************************************" ./tools/scripts/build_yocto.sh nxp3220-daudio2 nexell-image-qt

#!/bin/bash
cd yocto/out
echo "************************************" echo " BUILD-INFO.txt copy to result dir " echo "************************************" cp ${JENKINS_HOME}/snapshot_build_info/BUILD-INFO.txt result-nxp3220-daudio2-qt/
echo "************************************" echo " Compress result dirs " echo "************************************" tar cvzf result-nxp3220-daudio2-qt.tar.gz result-nxp3220-daudio2-qt/*
echo "************************************" echo " Rename tarballs " echo "************************************" mv result-nxp3220-daudio2-qt.tar.gz result-nxp3220-yocto-qt-daudio2-ref-`date +%Y%m%d`-daily.tar.gz
echo "************************************" echo " Rename result dirs " echo "************************************" mv result-nxp3220-daudio2-qt result-nxp3220-yocto-sumo-qt-daudio2-ref-`date +%Y%m%d`-daily
